title: Ephesus Historical Exploration
description:
Step Back in Time at Ephesus

Explore one of the most important archaeological sites in the world, Ephesus. This tour takes you through its ancient streets, grand theatres, and sacred sites that date back thousands of years.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Arrive and explore the ancient city of Ephesus. Walk through its famous streets, admire the Library of Celsus, and see the impressive Temple of Artemis.

Day 2: Visit the House of Virgin Mary and the Theatre of Ephesus. Learn about its rich history from expert guides.
shortDescription: Explore the ancient city of Ephesus
label: Historical Gem

itinerary: See the House of Virgin Mary
remarks: Dress modestly when visiting religious sites

title: Ephesus & Pamukkale Heritage Tour
description:
Explore Ephesus and Pamukkale’s Natural Beauty

Experience the rich history of Ephesus, followed by the natural wonders of Pamukkale. This tour offers the perfect blend of ancient culture and natural beauty.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Explore the ancient city of Ephesus, including its temples, the Celsus Library, and the Roman Theatre.

Day 2: Travel to Pamukkale and relax in its thermal waters, visit Hierapolis, and explore the ancient ruins of the city.

Day 3: Enjoy free time in Pamukkale to explore more or relax in the thermal pools before returning home.
shortDescription: A blend of history and natural beauty
label: Cultural & Natural Heritage

remarks: Comfortable shoes are recommended for both sites

title: Pamukkale Thermal Springs Tour
description:
Relax in the Thermal Waters of Pamukkale

Discover the natural beauty of Pamukkale, known for its stunning white mineral terraces and warm thermal waters. This 3-day tour offers relaxation and exploration in one of Turkey’s most iconic natural landmarks.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Arrive and explore the famous travertine terraces of Pamukkale, known for their healing properties and breathtaking beauty.

Day 2: Visit the ancient ruins of Hierapolis, an ancient spa town, and swim in the Cleopatra Pool.

Day 3: Enjoy free time to relax or explore the area before departing.
shortDescription: Relax and rejuvenate in Pamukkale’s thermal springs
label: Wellness Retreat

remarks: Bring swimwear for the thermal pools
Comfortable shoes for walking around the terraces

title: Pamukkale & Ephesus Wonders
description:
The Wonders of Pamukkale and Ephesus

This 5-day tour combines the historical marvels of Ephesus with the natural beauty of Pamukkale. From the ancient ruins to the healing thermal waters, this tour is the perfect combination of culture and nature.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Explore the ancient city of Ephesus, including the Temple of Artemis and the Library of Celsus.

Day 2: Visit the House of Virgin Mary and the Theatre of Ephesus.

Day 3: Travel to Pamukkale and experience its natural beauty. Relax in the thermal pools and explore the ancient ruins of Hierapolis.

Day 4-5: Enjoy time in Pamukkale and explore the region further before returning home.
shortDescription: A tour of Ephesus and Pamukkale’s best highlights
label: History & Nature

itinerary: Visit the House of Virgin Mary
remarks: Comfortable shoes for exploring ancient ruins
